## Projection.getScaleFactor() method

Returns the scaling factor that must be used to convert the units used by `worldPoint` to meters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract getScaleFactor(worldPoint: Vector3Like): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  worldPoint | [Vector3Like](./harp-geoutils.vector3like.md) | The position in world coordinates. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
